title: Streetwise
brief_description: In this series of episodes that advise on self-defence, it is shown how women cope in difficult situations, and experts also comment on how to deal with threatening situations. Episode 1 - Self Defence; Episode 2 - Pick pockets; Episode 3 - Burglars; Episode 4 - Sexual Harassment.
